Description: Reply data from indirect read command
Reply data from indirect read command
Indirect command to the indirect access memory
Trigger the beginning of an indirect access by setting to '1'. A completion of an indirect operation is marked by the device setting this field to '0'.
Type of indirect access: 0 - Write  1 - Read
Status of the last indirect command. If set to '1', then the last command failed on timeout. This field is valid only when IndirectTrigger is '0'.
Indirect command to the indirect access memory
Address increment with every repeated access, as indicated in IndirectRepeatCount
Type of indirect write: 0 - wait states, 1- transfer acknowledge
Configures a timeout period for IndirectCommand (per single access). Resolution is in clocks.
Each write command is executed IndirectRepeatCount number of times.  Every time, the address is incremented by IndirectAddressIncrement. If set to 0 or 1, one operation is performed.
Base address for Indirect access of memory Testmem
